framework_intro.para: 写此类报告时，建议采用以下结构。将报告要点和内容填写到相应位置。

commentary.para: 报告是对研究、调查或专题研究的描述，其目的是提供建议或报告最新情况，有时是说服读者接受某观点。它是由研究过该课题的个人或小组撰写的，其读者是需要了解有关信息的人。
以下是这份长篇报告所采用的结构。
后面的范例是一份长篇报告的报告摘要，因此并非所有这些部分都包括在内。
构思报告时，想好各段的内容并列出要点。

checklist.point: 进行调查研究并收集所有信息，包括事实和数据。
按本结构组织要点。
考虑读者。
用语言说明目的。
用语言概述调查研究并描述调研结果。
用语言做总结和提建议。
报告有必要则长，但尽可能简短。
报告主体部分应主要基于事实而非主观看法。
需要写的部分都写了吗？
题目清楚地表明报告主题了吗？
目录中的标题和标号与报告中的一致吗？
摘要部分对报告的陈述准确吗？
引言部分说明报告目的了吗？
引言部分说明报告包含（以及不包含）的内容了吗？
引言部分说明调研情况了吗？
报告的主体部分有标题和标号吗？
表格或图表可以使信息更加清楚吗？
结论部分说清楚我对于调研结果的看法了吗？
提出的建议确实以结论为依据吗？
检查用词、语法和拼写了吗？

paragraph.name: 目录
paragraph.desc: 使用与报告主体部分一致的小节标题和标号。

content.para: （对于篇幅较短的报告，目录不是必须的。本范例不设目录。）

paragraph.name: 摘要
paragraph.desc: 摘要报告的目的和目标、所进行的调查研究、调研结果和结论。若有提议，亦可附上。
paragraph.tip: 提示：这部分通常称作报告摘要（executive summary）。其结构与报告主体部分相同。

content.para: （对于篇幅较短的报告，摘要不是必须的，本范例不设摘要。）

paragraph.name: 引言
paragraph.desc: 这部分说明写报告的背景，并说明报告所涉及的内容以及进行过的调查研究。

notes.para: Compare 2 web designs - see which people prefer.
What attracts people and makes them buy products.

content.para: The purpose of this report is to compare two different web designs. The reason for this is to decide what kind of web page is most likely to attract new customers and to encourage existing customers to buy more products from us.

paragraph.name: 报告主体
paragraph.desc: 给出调查研究的确切信息和调研结果。
paragraph.tip: 提示：此处可提供表格和图表，也可以将它们放在附录中。

notes.para: Asked 2 developers for different page designs - one simple (A), one more sophisticated (B).
Research: 2 groups of 20 people (range of ages, professions, computer knowledge).
Made 2 groups: one used A, one B, once a day for a month to do tasks: buying, getting info, returning goods, tracking.
Also asked about technology for accessing Internet.

content.para: We asked two developers to produce alternative web pages for our company. We asked Developer A to produce a simple, easy-to-use design and we asked Developer B to produce a more sophisticated design with lots of eye-catching graphics. We conducted our research by asking a group of twenty existing customers and twenty non-customers to use the web page over a month. The group was made up of people with a range of ages, professions, incomes, and computer expertise. We divided the group in two and asked one sub-group to use Design A and the other to use Design B. We asked each sub-group to log on once a day and to use the web page to perform certain tasks, including: buying products, getting information, returning damaged products, and tracking deliveries. We also asked the sub-groups to assess how attractive they found their designs and whether they would be encouraged to return to the web page.
In addition, we researched the technology that people had available for accessing the Internet, including the devices people used and the connection speeds available.

paragraph.name: 结论／调研结果
paragraph.desc: 陈述调研结果和自己的看法。

notes.para: People liked easy-to-use page (A) for buying. Don't want entertainment - Design B may be slow to load, etc.

content.para: We found that, on the whole, people preferred to be able to purchase products quickly and easily. In conclusion, users do not visit a site such as ours for entertainment, and while they initially enjoyed some of the aspects of Design B these could take a long time to load and users eventually became bored.

paragraph.name: 建议
paragraph.tip: 提示：也可以预计提议被采纳时会出现什么情况。

notes.para: Adopt Design A (simple) with some features of B.

content.para: We recommend that we adopt Design A with two or three of the more practical features from Design B.

paragraph.name: 附录
paragraph.desc: 更详细的信息可列于附录中。

content.para: （对于篇幅较短的报告，附录不是必须的，本范例不设附录。）

paragraph.name: 参考书目
paragraph.desc: 列出报告中提及过的其他出版物。

content.para: （对于篇幅较短的报告，参考书目不是必须的，本范例不设参考书目。）
